pullrequest.title: Fix disabled button state in new tabs

content.raw:
I was able to reproduce the issue, thanks @iche033 . I think it was related to the attached() handler I had removed My apologies for that. I re-added it to this branch. Could you please check again ? 

Btw, I also added portalurl as a declared property. Just for consistency with the other properties
content.html:
I was able to reproduce the issue, thanks @iche033 . I think it was related to the attached() handler I had removed My apologies for that. I re-added it to this branch. Could you please check again ?

Btw, I also added portalurl as a declared property. Just for consistency with the other properties
